python q2graphs.py binary_xTrain.csv yTrain.csv binary_xTest.csv yTest.csv count_xTrain.csv yTrain.csv count_xTest.csv yTest.csv

['url 1', 'onc 2', 'dear 3', 'thi 4', 'on 5', 'nbsp 6', 'number 7', 'i 8', 'exmh 9', 
'the 10', 'us 11', 'at 12', 'a 13', 'hello 14', 'httpaddr 15', 'from 16', 'nextpart 17', 
'hi 18', 'in 19', 'begin 20']
